about_the_game:
Enter the wacky universe of Test Dummy Takedown, an explosive action game where you play as a crash test dummy armed and ready to do whatever it takes to survive. Face off against your friends in frantic battles where only the smartest and fastest will remain standing until the end.

Gameplay

Multiplayer Mode

From 2 to 8 players compete in arenas full of surprises.

Maps

The demo includes three unique arenas:

  • Crash Factory: An industrial lab where dummies are put to the test.

  • Gambling Ground: A chaotic casino where luck rules all.

  • Coconut Chaos: A tropical beach where danger lurks beneath the sand.

Weapons and Lives

Start each match with a pistol loaded with 30 bullets and choose the number of lives (between 1 and 10) in the settings to customize the intensity of the game.

Power Customization

The demo offers 15 powers, divided into three categories:

  • Movement: Dash, Mega Jump, Super Speed, Spin, Fake Death.

  • Ability: Dummy Boom, Invisibility, Invincibility, Heal, Fast Reload.

  • Secondary Weapon: Grenade, Sniper, Knife Throw, Knife Strike, Golden Gun.

You can choose 3 powers from these categories to match your playstyle.

Dummy Customization

The demo includes a small set of accessories to personalize your character and make them unique.

Strategy

Power Management

You can carry up to three powers at once. Choose wisely when to use them or remove them if you prefer to wait for a better opportunity.

Objective

The goal is simple: be the last dummy standing! Use all available means to eliminate your opponents and stay alive.

Test Dummy Takedown is the perfect game for fun-filled nights with friends, where every match is unique and full of surprises. Who will be the last survivor?

It's time to play!

name: Test Dummy Takedown Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: IntelCore i3 gen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: IntelCore i5 gen5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Comprend des éléments interactifs
Interactions en ligne, Chat en jeu

Limite d'âge pour : PEGI

short_description: Discover the demo of Test Dummy Takedown, an explosive action game where you play as an armed crash test dummy. Battle your friends in 3 arenas, use 15 powers, and customize your character. Only the fastest and smartest will survive. Will you be the last one standing?
